text: Grindrod Locomotives is a South African company that manufactures railway locomotives. == Leases == Another division of the company, Grindrod Rail owns and leases out over 60 locomotives to various railways. == Timeline == === 2016 === * Six locomotives ordered by Sitarail, for Ivory Coast and Burkina Faso. * The order is for 16 locomotives of two types : ** Shunter ** Mainline #CC33201-CC33210. == Types == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="border:1px;" !
